oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Explanatory remarks concerning copies of Bushmen Paintings and Etchings, collected by Mr. H.C. Schunke and deposited in the Grey Library. Partly in Bushman by and partly in English after |han kass'o (L VIII.
6073). A list of remarks by |han kass'o alongside the numbers (I
XXIV) of a collection of copies of paintings found in the Grey Library. These paintings are mostly of animals and rainmakers and their work with the rain.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman pictures nos. I
XXIV Collected By Mr H.C. Schunke, and deposited in the Grey Library
